channel.title: What should I do with a broken handphone?
channel.description: I sat on the LCD screen and now all it gives me is a blue screen of death,I stil can make calls though. Should I send it for repairs or get a new one?

item.title: What should I do with a broken handphone?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

they send you new phone if you break the one you had, same model of phone though

Read full topic
